summary: Standalone, craftable full set of  Daedric armor, designed for the characters specialized in stealth. Heavy and light version availible
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve got tired wearing a ton of plates and stuff, but don\'t want to fight dragons butt naked and nipples out. So I made this. Standalone, craftable(daedric smith perk required) and enchantable full set of armor for female and male characters. Contains heavy and light armor versions.
[youtube]fqRC4hsjgCA[/youtube]
[youtube]yjZ2gwL76RY[/youtube]
Installation: 
1 :If you have previous version installed it\'s strongly recommended to remove it before intallation, to avoid undesired and inpredictible effects, like missing texture, armor pieces mismatch and whatever.
2: Then extract meshes,textures and one esp file at your choice to Skyrim\\Data folder 
3: Check this mod in the mod manager and play.

v1.3 changes 
-Male version added
-Boots added
-Cloak added
-Female version normal map works correctly

See also my other mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23726]Daedric sai weapon[/url]
author: lamer1000
